sections.body: The barbarian is a brutal berserker from beyond the edge of civilized lands.
sections.name: Barbarian

sections.body: The bard uses skill and spell alike to bolster his allies, confound his enemies, and build upon his fame.
sections.name: Bard

sections.body: A devout follower of a deity, the cleric can heal wounds, raise the dead, and call down the wrath of the gods.
sections.name: Cleric

sections.body: The druid is a worshiper of all things natural—a spellcaster, a friend to animals, and a skilled shapechanger.
sections.name: Druid

sections.body: Brave and stalwart, the fighter is a master of all manner of arms and armor.
sections.name: Fighter

sections.body: A student of martial arts, the monk trains his body to be his greatest weapon and defense.
sections.name: Monk

sections.body: The paladin is the knight in shining armor, a devoted follower of law and good.
sections.name: Paladin

sections.body: A tracker and hunter, the ranger is a creature of the wild and of tracking down his favored foes.
sections.name: Ranger

sections.body: The rogue is a thief and a scout, an opportunist capable of delivering brutal strikes against unwary foes.
sections.name: Rogue

sections.body: The spellcasting sorcerer is born with an innate knack for magic and has strange, eldritch powers.
sections.name: Sorcerer

sections.body: The wizard masters magic through constant study that gives him incredible magical power.
sections.name: Wizard
